name: Guns and Towers
description:
This game is mix of top-down tower defense and first-person action.
Your goal is to protect the generator from waves of relentless enemies.
Start on an open field where you have to punch the bad guys yourself. Feel the power fantasy of building up an automated network of defenses and control the path of your enemies.

Campaign
  • 3 unique levels
  • New buildings unlocked after completing each level
  • Auto-save after every finished wave
  • If you are curious how many more waves you could have managed, you can continue playing every level endlessly after beating it
Extras

Gets unlocked once you've completed the campaign

  • Hunted mode where enemies are after you (building mode is gone too)
  • Experimental procedural mode (some seeds may turn out ridiculously difficult or unplayably buggy - play at your own risk!)
Features
  • Controller support (tested with Xbox-style controllers)
  • 3 difficulty settings
  • "Great on Deck" :D (copy Linux build over and add GunsAndTowers.x86_64 as non-Steam game)
